Title: Requires the department of health to establish controlled substance disposal kits to provide information on the disposal and collection of certain controlled substances to pharmacy customers
Summary: Requires the department of health to establish controlled substance disposal kits to provide information on the disposal and collection of certain controlled substances to pharmacy customers; provides such kits shall be provided at no charge to customers.
LawCode: Add ยง291-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to controlled substance disposal kits
